record.description: Seeking Promenade Queen Title. Candidates for Washington Promenade Queen at the University of Chicago view crown held by Freda Gould of New York City, which the winner will wear at the Prom on Friday night in the Stevens Hotel Grand Ballroom. Left to right: Nanette Talbot, Solveig Dahl, Carol Schremp, Freda Gould; Carol Finkelhor, Flora Ann Beutel, and Susan Cullen.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
